participant_1.name: Emily Rodriguez
participant_1.personality: adventurous and creative, with a passion for culinary arts and travel.
participant_1.background: i love to cook paella. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: outdoorsy and practical, with a love for nature and engineering.
participant_2.background: i like to go hiking in the spring. i live in colorado. i have a black lab named trooper. i'm a mechanical engineer. my favorite activity is rock climbing.
